about_the_game:
Tyga is a single-player horror delivery game. It's your job to help Tyga deliver lifesaving medicine to those who can afford it. You will enter your delivery vehicle and depart from their warehouse to make periodic stops at every home on your route. Make sure to check the security cameras before you exit the vehicle just to be safe! If its ever too dark to see you can use the lights that come with your vehicle to check for any irregularities outside of your vehicle. After you reach the end of the route, you will repeat it all again the next day until payday! It tends to get more dangerous and hectic as the week goes on so be sure to deliver with caution... With enough hard work, someday it could be you receiving packages from them! See you on the road, Tygan!

Welcome to Tyga! As an employee and resident of Tyga Estate 36-B, it is your job to deliver Bacteriophages to our insured customers. The road can be perilous, which is why we've equipped our employees with the means of self-preservation and Phage protection. Utilize your Bohr Model Æ, a top-of-the-line vehicle generously supplied by Tyga, to maintain a steady course through your pre-planned route.

Thanks to our partnership with Orange Inc, your taxes go towards supplying every Bohr with a Cam-Puter 15 Ultimate Pro Max (basic chipset). With their revolutionary technology, you have a full 360-degree view of your Bohr's exterior. That's right, nothing gets in or out without Tyga knowing about it. We're watching you...succeed!



Engage your (up to) 20,000 Lumens of light with our patented Bohr Light System for a clear view of what the darkness holds and steer clear of any hazards, the clock is ticking! Go Green! Here at Tyga, we care about the environment. Which is why our Bohr Light System is designed to preserve power and cut down on light pollution, hence our timed lights are ready to light the way only when you need them! You're welcome, Mother Earth! Lastly, we've provided a handprint ID for each Bohr, allowing you to start and stop at your destinations without any worry of someone meddling with your Bohr!



Keep moving- our objective at Tyga is to complete our deliveries in a timely manner, no missed packages or late deliveries. Failure to do so will result in corrective action, but don't worry, Tyga makes every effort to ensure your success! Thanks again, for joining the team.

...and remember, you're in good company.

Tyga is a single-player horror delivery game. It's your job to help Tyga deliver lifesaving medicine to those who can afford it. You will enter your delivery vehicle and depart from their warehouse to make periodic stops at every home on your route. Make sure to check the security cameras before you exit the vehicle just to be safe! With enough hard work, someday it could be you receiving packages from them! See you on the road, Tygan!

name: TYGA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5-1600 / Intel Core i5-7600K
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not Supported

short_description: Welcome to Tyga! It's your job to help us deliver lifesaving medicine to those who can afford it. With enough hard work, someday that could be you! See you on the road Tygan!
